effect.sun_moon: User copies the target’s species, weight, type, ability, calculated stats (except HP), and moves. Copied moves will all have 5 PP remaining. IVs are copied for the purposes of hidden power, but stats are not recalculated. choice band, choice scarf, and choice specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor forced by encore.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User copies the target’s species, weight, type, ability, calculated stats (except HP), and moves. Copied moves will all have 5 PP remaining. IVs are copied for the purposes of hidden power, but stats are not recalculated. choice band, choice scarf, and choice specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor forced by encore.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User copies the target’s species, weight, type, ability, calculated stats (except HP), and moves. Copied moves will all have 5 PP remaining. IVs are copied for the purposes of hidden power, but stats are not recalculated. choice band, choice scarf, and choice specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor forced by encore.

short_effect.sun_moon: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.
